tool_description: Plug and play the facial authentication into: point of sale, mobile app, self-checkouts, kiosk, ATM.
name: Auther Check
title: Auther Check

api_list.name: Get person by id
api_list.description: To check if the person_id already exists in the system, just specify the path with person_id. If the person_id exists in response you will get the same person_id and information when a person was created and updated.
